name: Corvin and The Cauldron of Who-Knows-What
name_original: Corvin and The Cauldron of Who-Knows-What
description:
A puzzle game with wacky spells, dialogue, events, and unfoldings. Defeat is possible, but so is victory.

You play as Corvin, a sophmore from the local Wizard College.

Corvin has been summoned by the King and Queen to potentially be hired as a part-time wizard. The six other wizards that appeared have all been beheaded, can Corvin avoid his inevitable fate?

Controls

Mouse only! Drag items from the bag to the cauldron to cast a spell. A spell requires three items from the bag; your goal is to find which three items cast the desired spell.

Credits
  • Celtican for the programming, scripting, and otherwise keyboard crunching
  • Gardenovena for the graphics, painting, and otherwise looking good
  • Marshmallow for the audio, harp, and otherwise feeling good
